fields.description:
Reported by [~chiwanpark]
bq. Since 2.7.3 release, Client.get/setPingInterval is changed from public to package-private.
bq. Giraph is one of broken examples for this changes. (https://github.com/apache/giraph/blob/release-1.0/giraph-core/src/main/java/org/apache/giraph/job/GiraphJob.java#L202)
fields.summary: CLONE - Fix source-level compatibility after HADOOP-11252

comments.body: I think we should fix this issue in 2.8 and 2.9, and may be in 3.x as well. CC [~subru], [~andrew.wang] and [~wangda].

The jenkins test failed due to java 8 installation on particular node if without cache:
{noformat}
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... [0m[91m302 Moved Temporarily
Location: https://edelivery.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u144-b01/090f390dda5b47b9b721c7dfaa008135/jdk-8u144-linux-x64.tar.gz [following]

download failed
Oracle JDK 8 is NOT installed.

It seems a known issue given oracle change protocol/process of java 8 download and I remember I saw some patches to fix this...
